entry.title: This is why we can't have nice ships
entry.summary:
Author: fUcK_yOu_GaYbO

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,499Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: One moment, everything is normal. The next? 3 dozen familiar faces wake up in a strange, ever-shifting room—with a mysterious voice calling itself *The Shipper* running the show.The rules? Complete challenges based on your most popular ships. Confess your feelings. Face your unresolved tension. Solve puzzles or get emotionally wrecked trying.It’s fandom meets escape room meets romantic chaos, with pairings pulled from across the multiverse: Buddie, Byler, Chenford, and more. No one’s leaving until they’ve faced the truth—and maybe even each other.Because in this place, feelings aren’t optional. They’re the key.

entry.title: Troubled Waters
entry.summary:
Author: Baileyloves911

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,645Chapters: 30/?Kudos: 141

Summary: Buck’s phone buzzes again and he checks it and winces.“if you’re with someone else, just say it but i know you still love me.”“Oh come on!”Buck practically yells.Eddie walks behind Buck angrily just in time to see the message.Without a warning he snatches the phone right out of Buck’s hand.“Eddie!”Buck yells lunging up from the couch“Give it back!”But Eddie’s already typing with his knuckles are white.“If this guy doesn’t understand boundaries, then he can deal with me.”“Eddie seriou-““No”Eddie shoots him a look.“You shouldn’t have to deal with this crap. He doesn’t get to haunt you like this.”He finishes typing and tosses the phone back.Buck stares at the screen.“This is Eddie I said leave Buck alone dude. Don’t text him again.”Buck blinks as he reads the text“Well that’s..direct”

entry.title: Til the words come back
entry.summary:
Author: Vike02002

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,517Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 15

Summary: AU :Eddie is in the military, operating on ground in Afghanistan. He walks past the bullets, the dead, and dust. One day, he starts reading a book one of his comrades gave him, without any expectation of it being good.He becomes obsessed with the reading, which gives him a little time to fly away from war, and decides to send a letter to the adress written at the end of the book.At the same time, on the other side of the ocean, in Los Angeles, Buck struggles to finish writing his last book, and has to deal with a fan obsessed with him at the point where he finds himself in danger.At some point, their both worlds will colapse, and create maybe the best story ever written.

entry.title: can’t say anything to your face (‘cause look at your face)
entry.summary:
Author: mxrvxl

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,943Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: It’s really starting to get on Eddie’s nerves.Buck just won’t - he won’t even look at him.Sure, when Buck had opened the door to Eddie, he’d stared for a good minute, drinking in the sight of him before throwing himself over the threshold and into Eddie’s arms, before nearly climbing over Eddie to get to Chris, hugging the kid so tightly that Eddie thought he might pop.But now, when they’re at work or are cooking dinner or are just simply sitting on the couch, Buck will not look at him. Not in the eye, nothing.And Eddie knows this because he can’t stop looking at Buck.

entry.title: Check my phone any day (But don't be shocked if you find something)
entry.summary:
Author: fUcK_yOu_GaYbO

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,846Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Buck is still in shock, did that really just happen? Is Bobby really dead? A million thoughts ran through his head at once. His ears were ringing and his cheeks burned from tears. He could hear Athena scream crying something at someone but he just couldn’t pay attention to anything or anyone at the moment. His heart stung, he knew it wasn’t true but this just felt like one more person in his life abandoning him. First his parents, then Maddie then Eddie and now- oh shit- EddieEddie- suddenly all of Buck's thoughts stopped and he just had one, “Has anyone told Eddie what happened?” the thought rang through his head.

entry.title: Building Home from the Ashes
entry.summary:
Author: Thegasps

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,950Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 78

Summary: When Eddie Diaz interrupts Buck’s impulsive call to a lawyer—a decision born of Bobby Nash’s crushing doubt and Buck’s spiraling insecurity—he unknowingly reroutes the course of their lives. With Carla temporarily unavailable, Buck steps in to care for Christopher, trading firehouse shifts for playgrounds, science museums, and bedtime stories. What begins as a temporary fix becomes a lifeline: for Buck, who rediscovers his purpose in Christopher’s laughter and Eddie’s quiet trust; for Eddie, who slowly lets go of his "lone wolf" instincts as Buck seamlessly stitches himself into the fabric of their little family; and for Christopher, who finds unwavering support in the man who’s always treated him like a partner, not a responsibility.But as days blur into weeks, late-night talks over shared beers and lingering touches ignite something deeper between Buck and Eddie—a tenderness neither can name, yet neither can ignore. Between fevers fought, school projects salvaged, and a couch that always seems to pull them closer, Buck and Eddie confront the truth: healing isn’t found in proving yourself to others, but in building a home with the people who see you, broken pieces and all.

entry.title: Steady as Eddie
entry.summary:
Author: Foolishkin

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,769Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 144

Summary: In a canon-divergent Season 1 where Abby’s absence shifts fate, Evan “Buck” Buckley’s whirlwind heart finds an unexpected anchor in Eddie Diaz—an Army medic turned CPR instructor with a dry wit, a son, and a quiet life Buck is determined to protect. But when the 118 dismisses Eddie as yet another of Buck’s impulsive myths, a heated confrontation forces Buck to confront their skepticism head-on. The stakes skyrocket when a chaotic emergency call throws Eddie into the fray, his calm competence under fire leaving the team stunned.

entry.title: Nothing is Safe in the Quiet
entry.summary:
Author: toastylamp

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,592Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 160

Summary: “Tommy, fucking answer me!”He was yelling now, swiping his free hand nervously over his hair. He felt the urge to hit something. Someone. He wanted to punch and punch and punch until his knuckles bled out because it meant he could still feel something.“Evan is going to need you, you know,” Tommy says quietly. Eddie can hear sobs in the background.Now what the fuck is that supposed to mean?“What happened to Bobby?” Eddie’s voice breaks. “Where is he?”Tommy exhales like it hurts. “Bobby Nash is dead.”It hits Eddie like a bag of bricks to his stomach. His knees weaken, his ears ring, and for a second, everything goes white.When he returns to reality, Tommy’s voice calls his name on the phone.He swipes at his face, breath shaky. “Tell Buck I’m on the next flight out.”He hangs up. Or:Eddie Diaz is just trying to have a quiet movie night with his son when the phone rings. It’s Tommy Kinard—and he’s saying Bobby Nash is dead. Everything spirals after that.

entry.title: Closer Than Breathing
entry.summary:
Author: Stargazingggame

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,234Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 48

Summary: When Eddie Diaz reluctantly moves in with Buck during a quarantine lockdown to protect Christopher, their friendship bends under the weight of proximity. What starts as a practical arrangement—shared chores, late-night movies, and a single bed that forces them closer—slowly unravels into something Eddie can’t name. Sophia Diaz’s teasing texts become a relentless mirror, reflecting truths Eddie isn’t ready to face: the lingering touches, the way Buck’s laughter settles in his ribs, the breathless moment they almost kiss before Christopher interrupts. But when a fever threatens Christopher and fear cracks their careful distance open, Eddie must confront what he’s been denying—that some habits aren’t meant to stay platonic.

entry.title: The list
entry.summary:
Author: Tubagirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,090Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: Evan “Buck” Buckley is given the all clear to go back to work after being struck by lightning.
